ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1.2 ounce) package creamy pesto sauce mix (such as Knorr®)

cookingTips: Brown the sausage completely and break it into small pieces for even distribution
Whisk the pesto sauce mix with milk until smooth before adding to prevent lumps
Toss hot pasta with the sauce immediately for better coating and flavor absorption
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a quick weeknight meal using convenience products. Guide them on properly browning sausage and combining the sauce components for a cohesive dish.
